meanings.definition: A person who consorts with prostitutes.
meanings.sent1: The whoremonger was seen entering the red-light district late at night.
meanings.sent2: The police arrested the whoremonger for soliciting sex workers.
meanings.sent3: The whoremonger thought he was being discreet, but everyone knew his secret.
meanings.sent4: His reputation as a whoremonger spread through the town like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The image of the whoremonger loitering on the street corner was hard to forget.

meanings.definition: A person who engages in promiscuous sexual activity.
meanings.sent1: She was labeled a whoremonger by her conservative neighbors due to her many partners.
meanings.sent2: The tabloids portrayed him as a wealthy whoremonger with a different date every night.
meanings.sent3: The whoremonger's calendar was busier than a beehive in spring.
meanings.sent4: In the eyes of the town, he was a whoremonger of the heart, breaking many along the way.
meanings.sent5: Her reputation as a whoremonger preceded her wherever she went.
